leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算科学方法论与数值计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 稀疏矩阵/算子, 网格与离散系统, PDE/ODE, 误差/收敛数据
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 离散化→求解→误差/稳定性→加速→验证→可复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 数值库/求解器框架 + 自动微分/可微分计算 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 数值线性代数与稀疏求解器生态
unit.coverage_tools: Sparse direct/iterative solvers、预条件、Krylov、AMG、矩阵分解库

tools.name: GalerkinSparseGrids.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Grid Discretization with Discontinuous Galerkin Method for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing Sparse Grid Discretization using the Discontinuous Galerkin Method, specifically designed for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) efficiently.

tools.name: RandLAPACK
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C++ library for randomized numerical linear algebra
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library focused on randomized algorithms for numerical linear algebra, providing high-performance implementations for tasks like matrix decomposition and solving linear systems.

tools.name: ISOtope
tools.one_line_profile: Standalone Iterative Solver for 2D sketch constraints
tools.detailed_description: A standalone iterative solver written in Rust, designed to solve 2D geometric constraints, typically used in CAD and sketching applications.

tools.name: CPMpy
tools.one_line_profile: Constraint Programming and Modeling library in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Constraint Programming and Modeling library in Python that integrates with NumPy and provides direct access to various solvers for optimization and constraint satisfaction problems.

tools.name: EIG
tools.one_line_profile: Eigen tools for population genetics by Nick Patterson and Alkes Price lab
tools.detailed_description: A suite of software tools (EIGENSOFT/EIGENSTRAT) for population genetics analysis, widely used for detecting population structure and stratification using principal component analysis.

tools.name: bmssp
tools.one_line_profile: Deterministic Single-Source Shortest Paths solver
tools.detailed_description: A clean, typed, and tested implementation of a deterministic Single-Source Shortest Paths (SSSP) solver for directed graphs, featuring a divide-and-conquer design.

tools.name: GraphBLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Graph algorithms in the language of linear algebra
tools.detailed_description: The SuiteSparse:GraphBLAS library, providing a complete implementation of the GraphBLAS standard for expressing graph algorithms using linear algebra operations.

tools.name: SuiteSparse
tools.one_line_profile: A suite of sparse matrix algorithms
tools.detailed_description: The official SuiteSparse library containing a collection of sparse matrix algorithms (including UMFPACK, CHOLMOD, SPQR) for solving sparse linear systems and other matrix operations.

tools.name: nsparse
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse matrix computation library for GPU
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing sparse matrix computations on GPUs, designed to accelerate numerical methods involving large sparse systems.

tools.name: HiGHS
tools.one_line_profile: High performance linear optimization software
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance software for solving linear optimization problems (Linear Programming, Mixed-Integer Programming), providing robust solvers and interfaces.

tools.name: elsi-interface
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for electronic structure codes to connect with solver libraries
tools.detailed_description: A software interface that allows electronic structure codes to seamlessly connect with various high-performance solver libraries like ELPA, PEXSI, and SLEPc, facilitating large-scale quantum mechanical simulations.

tools.name: Armadillo
tools.one_line_profile: C++ linear algebra library
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality C++ linear algebra library (mirror) aiming for a good balance between speed and ease of use, providing a MATLAB-like syntax for matrix operations.

tools.name: Epigraph
tools.one_line_profile: C++ interface for linear, quadratic and second order cone problems

tools.name: torchmf

tools.name: bpmf

tools.detailed_description: High-performance implementation of Bayesian Probabilistic Matrix Factorization (BPMF) using Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC), suitable for large-scale sparse matrix completion and prediction tasks in scientific computing.

tools.name: CoGAPS

tools.name: CP3d

tools.name: python-suitesparse-graphblas

tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multi-physics engineering and scientific problems solver suite
tools.detailed_description: A massive collection of open-source software libraries for solving large-scale, complex multi-physics engineering and scientific problems, featuring packages for linear/nonlinear solvers, discretization, and more.

tools.name: Solver-in-the-Loop
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for interacting with iterative PDE solvers via differentiable physics
tools.detailed_description: A framework and codebase for the 'Solver-in-the-Loop' methodology, enabling deep learning models to interact with and improve iterative PDE solvers through differentiable physics.

tools.name: HelmNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep-learning based iterative solver for the heterogeneous 2D Helmholtz equation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework that acts as an iterative solver for the Helmholtz equation in heterogeneous media, combining U-Net architectures with multigrid methods.

tools.name: UCNLNav
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving navigation, geodetic, and multilateration problems
tools.detailed_description: A multi-language library (C#/Matlab/Rust) providing algorithms for 2D/3D navigation and geodesy, including Time-Of-Arrival (TOA), Angle-Of-Arrival (AOA), and Vincenty's formulae for direct/inverse geodetic problems.

tools.name: Universal Java Matrix Package (UJMP)
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for sparse and dense matrix computations and linear algebra
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Java library for handling sparse and dense matrices, providing linear algebra operations, visualization capabilities, and big data support.

tools.name: Quagmire
tools.one_line_profile: Surface process framework on scalable unstructured meshes
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for simulating surface processes (e.g., erosion, transport) on highly scalable unstructured meshes, developed by Underworld Geodynamics.

tools.name: Underworld2
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel particle-in-cell finite element code for Geodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, particle-in-cell, finite element code designed for large-scale geodynamics simulations, allowing modelling of complex fluid flows in the Earth's mantle and lithosphere.

tools.name: oneMath
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance mathematical library for oneAPI
tools.detailed_description: The oneAPI Math Library (oneMath) provides highly optimized mathematical routines, including BLAS, LAPACK, sparse solvers, and random number generators, for cross-architecture high-performance computing.

tools.name: torch-trust-ncg
tools.one_line_profile: Trust Region Newton Conjugate Gradient optimizer for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Trust Region Newton Conjugate Gradient (TRNCG) optimization algorithm, useful for training complex models where second-order information is beneficial.

tools.name: Waiwera
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel geothermal flow simulator
tools.detailed_description: A parallel, open-source simulator for geothermal flow and heat transport, designed to model subsurface flows in geothermal reservoirs.

tools.name: Numerix
tools.one_line_profile: Linear algebra and numerical computing library for Swift
tools.detailed_description: A Swift library providing linear algebra and numerical computing capabilities, enabling scientific computing within the Swift ecosystem.

tools.name: CSparse.NET
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving sparse linear systems in .NET
tools.detailed_description: A .NET port of the CSparse library, providing concise and efficient direct methods for solving sparse linear systems.

tools.name: TopADD
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel topology optimization framework using PETSc
tools.detailed_description: A 2D/3D integrated topology optimization parallel-computing framework capable of handling arbitrary design domains, built on top of the PETSc library.

tools.name: fd3d
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative FDFD solver for Maxwell's equations
tools.detailed_description: An iterative Finite-Difference Frequency-Domain (FDFD) solver for Maxwell's equations, optimized for large 3D electromagnetic problems.

tools.name: SuperLU
tools.one_line_profile: Supernodal sparse direct solver for linear systems
tools.detailed_description: A general purpose library for the direct solution of large, sparse, nonsymmetric systems of linear equations, employing supernodal techniques.

tools.name: SuperLU_DIST
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed memory MPI-based SuperLU solver
tools.detailed_description: A distributed memory parallel extension of SuperLU for solving large sparse linear systems using MPI.

tools.name: rARPACK
tools.one_line_profile: R interface to ARPACK for large scale eigenvalue problems
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the ARPACK library for solving large scale eigenvalue and Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) problems.

tools.name: taichi_LBM3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D sparse Lattice Boltzmann Method solver in Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance 3D sparse Lattice Boltzmann Method (LBM) fluid solver implemented using the Taichi programming language.

tools.name: pytorch-NMF
tools.one_line_profile: Non-negative Matrix Factorization in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch package for Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF), enabling GPU-accelerated matrix decomposition often used in signal processing and data analysis.

tools.name: roptim
tools.one_line_profile: Unified C++ wrapper for general purpose optimization in R
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a unified C++ wrapper to call functions of the algorithms underlying the optim() solver in R, facilitating general purpose optimization tasks within C++ code.

tools.name: non-convex
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of non-convex optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A self-contained library implementing various non-convex optimization algorithms including Steepest Descent, Conjugate Gradient, Newton's Method, and Quasi-Newton methods (BFGS, l-BFGS).

tools.name: mathtoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: C++ mathematical tools for interpolation and optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++11 library based on Eigen that provides mathematical tools for interpolation, dimensionality reduction, and optimization, designed for scientific and graphics applications.

tools.name: feasible_sqp
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential Quadratic Programming solver for nonlinear programming
tools.detailed_description: A solver for nonlinear programming problems utilizing a sequential quadratic programming (SQP) strategy that maintains feasible intermediate iterates.

tools.name: zpc
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel computing library for physics-based simulations
tools.detailed_description: A parallel computing library designed to support Zenus physics-based simulations, facilitating high-performance computational tasks.

tools.name: CNMF_E
tools.one_line_profile: Constrained Nonnegative Matrix Factorization for microEndoscopic data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the CNMF-E algorithm for extracting neural activity from microendoscopic calcium imaging data, specifically designed to handle background signals in complex biological data.
